description: Temporary component mapping until MASTER-REGISTRY.json is implemented

US001.title: Organisation Receives Cold Call
US001.description: Organisation receives cold call from Bemeda sales representative

US002.title: Discuss Staffing Needs
US002.description: Organisation discusses staffing needs and platform benefits

US003.title: Agree to Job Posting
US003.description: Organisation agrees to publish job posting with specific requirements

US004.title: Review Matched Candidates
US004.description: Organisation reviews matched candidates in dashboard

US005.title: Conduct Interviews
US005.description: Organisation conducts interviews and selects candidate

US006.title: Complete Hiring Process
US006.description: Organisation completes hiring process and onboarding

US007.title: JobSeeker Creates Profile
US007.description: JobSeeker creates comprehensive profile on platform

US008.title: Receive Job Notification
US008.description: JobSeeker receives notification of matching job opportunity

US009.title: Review and Apply
US009.description: JobSeeker reviews job details and applies

US011.title: Receive Job Offer
US011.description: JobSeeker receives job offer and accepts

US012.title: Complete Onboarding
US012.description: JobSeeker completes onboarding and starts position

US013.title: Identify Healthcare Org
US013.description: Sales Team identifies potential healthcare organisation

US014.title: Make Initial Contact
US014.description: Sales Team makes initial contact via cold call

US015.title: Present Platform Benefits
US015.description: Sales Team presents platform benefits and capabilities

US018.title: Follow-up Opportunities
US018.description: Sales Team follows up for additional opportunities
